Description: Fragment of rim and neck (mended from four fragments) of Chian pottery trefoil oinochoe; white slip; exterior: glazed streaky black (fired brown); inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The sherd joins British Museum 1886,0401.486, and 1886,0401.497. For parallels, see Boardman 1967 144 fig. 92 no. 589. The Emporio sherd was found in a layer with a date range of 690-550BC.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0050) (phase 2)
